user_query: I need to retrieve the latest key metrics for my company with the identifier 'ABC123'. Additionally, fetch the details of the table with the ID 456789. Also, provide me with the settlement history of my portfolio. Finally, check the exchange status to ensure trading is active.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest key metrics for the company identified by 'ABC123'.
Fetch the details of the table with ID '456789'.
Provide the settlement history of the user's portfolio.
Check the exchange status to ensure trading is active.
